setting.name: *SaveHighCPUResources
setting.desc: Save to RAM (every 5 seconds) CPU usage of resources that are using over specified % to debug when web/ingame PB isn't accessible

setting.name: *SaveHighCPUResourcesAmount
setting.desc: The amount of CPU a resource must use before being logged as a high CPU user. Default: 10

setting.name: *NotifyIPBUsersOfHighUsage
setting.desc: Requires SaveHighCPUResources to be enabled. Will notify any IPB users if a resources goes over the specified value of CPU %. Default is 50. Set to 1000 to disable.

setting.name: *AccessRightName
setting.desc: The name of the access right that a player needs in order to be able to use IPB. Default: general.http
